articles.author: Andrew Jones
articles.title: Here's how SpaceX's 1st orbital Starship launch will work - Space.com
articles.description: The test flight will launch from South Texas, head over the Gulf of Mexico and ultimately splash down near Hawaii.
articles.content:
An overhead view of SpaceX's Starship on the launch pad ahead of its planned orbital test flight. (Image credit: SpaceX via Twitter)
